title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Brett Winterble guides us through a very special Open Line Friday. Joe Biden seeks another doomed ceasefire, even though they never work. The celebration of Dan's Bake Sale, 28 years after Rush made history. Rush said it: Stand with Israel or we're next. Cuomo collusion over not believing all women.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Brett welcomes The Limbaugh Letter team of Diana and Denise to the show to discuss the genesis of Dan's Bake Sale as we celebrate its 28th anniversary. The "farding" bit that got Rush fired for 45 minutes makes a comeback in post-mask world. Democrats split over Israel, GOP over 1/6 commission. This Friday's Road Trip with Rush: Walk in the Black Forest.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

It's the eve of the 28th anniversary of Dan's Bake Sale, and we're reminiscing with listeners. Biden and Kamala are all about identity politics, not accomplishments. Rush warned us about schools indoctrinating your kids, and now it's down to coaches being forced into "diversity training." Rush thanks the greatest audience out there, and the crowd roars its love.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
